directions: Cook sausage and onion in large skillet over medium-high heat 8-10 minutes or until sausage is thoroughly cooked, stirring frequently; drain.
Place tostada shells on serving plates.  Top with sausage mixture, eggs, cheese, salsa and cilantro.
ingredients: 1 (9.6 ounce) package Jimmy Dean® Original Hearty Pork Sausage Crumbles
6 cooked eggs, such as poached, fried or over-easy
title: Sausage and Egg Tostadas
